description: More befrienders, more senior-friendly activities and spaces will prepare Singapore for an ageing society. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Look ahead to 2024: Gearing up for super-aged Singapore
title_page: Look ahead to 2024: Gearing up for super-aged Singapore | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE â€“ By March, Jurong Community Hospital will have seven model flats where patients can practise everyday activities, such as getting up from bed or doing laundry, before they are discharged.
These home-like environments, named Space@JCH, can be used for functional rehabilitation.
